amendment.description: To extend the grandfather clauses for the term of the moratorium extension.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 3052 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 59 - 37. Record Vote Number: 76.

Amendment SA 3052 proposed by Senator Feinstein to Amendment SA 3048. (consideration: CR S4662-4666; text as modified: CR S4662) To extend the grandfather clauses for the term of the moratorium extension.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 3052 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 59 - 37. Record Vote Number: 76.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3052 proposed by Senator Feinstein to Amendment SA 3048.
